DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the potential immunomodulatory synergy of the association of metronomic cyclophosphamide (CMC) and interferon-alpha (IFN-alpha).
DOC.brief_title: Pharmaco-immunological Study of Interferon-alpha and Metronomic Cyclophosphamide Association in Neuroendocrine Tumors
